description:
A short but action packed canyon above the Stillwater River.

Approach

Reference canyoningthe406. You may get permission from the local Mine to cross their property. If not, you'll have to cross the Stillwater River. This can be very dangerous. Once across follow the dirt roads to the bench. Cross the bench and drop into Nye creek.

Descent

Rappel 1: 140 feet Rappel 2: 120 feet Rappel 3: 40 feet

Exit

Exit the canyon and cross the river. Use your shuttle or walk up the road back up to your car.

Red tape

If wanting to cross the Mine's land. Contact the foreman at their security booth (in person)

Beta sites

https://www.canyoningthe406.com/new-page-3

Trip reports and media

Background
name: Cut rope canyon
